name: Goredrinker
tooltip:
Goredrinker

Cost: 3300


UNIQUE Passive - Spite: Gain 0% − 15% (based on missing health) bonus attack damage.

UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.

UNIQUE Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal 110% AD physical damage to enemies in a circle around you. Heal for 20% AD (+ 12% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 second cooldown, reduced by ability haste).
